name: They have HORNS
description: They have HORNS is a fast topdown shooter in which it is essential to listen to his intuition in order to stand as long as possible the enemy hordes. Easy to learn, but hard to master. The up to 4 player coop mode works very simple via plugn play.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-Bit Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core CPU Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 900 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 64-Bit Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: i5 or better Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: 8 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 900 MB available space
